attributes.action: stop Alcester High School's ridiculous plan to divide tutor groups and form a new house system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The main change will be a move to a house system. The student population will be divided into 4  houses:
Billeslet
Greville
Oversley
Ragley
The second big change will be with the tutor groups. Each house will have 10 tutor groups making the groups smaller. In each group will be approximately 5 people from each year group. Making a group of 25 people in each tutor group.
Students are being seperated from life long friends and being imprisoned with people who they do not get on with.
Every single pupil at the school opposes the idea. Please show your support to the 850 students who from September 2007 will have to suffer.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
